column4: anyone know why a video card would work on one computer and not another, both support agp 2x/4x
does one of them have onboard gfx ?
could be something wrong with one of the MB's then, or some IRQ conflict maybe, tho I doubt that the case
yeah, i have to use this older video card on the computer that doesnt take the newer one
does the card require external power?
no, i just plug it into my other computer and it works
but on the p3 computer i just have a black screen
yes, but there might be an internal 12v connector
trying to install it for a better ubuntu experience =)
could it be the power supply?
